TextView.android:text:
This application is all about connecting people to moments in time. You simply have to 'leave' a pin, with the information you desire, attached to your current coordinates. This is version 1.0, and will probably have some bugs, but we are working tirelessly to get this product ready to serve the world in its full form. In order to accomplish this, we will roll out updates periodically with more features and fixes. If you have questions or comments, please leave them on the Google Play Store page. 
 
 Thanks for downloading!!! 
 
 Now, Login with your phone number to get started. Other Sign-In methods will be available soon. You can also choose to use the application without logging in, but some features will be unavailable.
